info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued June 04 at 2:44AM MDT until June 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR THE DRY ARM OF FORT PECK LAKE... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Lake Wind Advisory for the Dry Arm of Fort Peck Lake, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MDT this evening. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * TIMING...This afternoon through the early evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and a large fetch along the Dry Arm of Fort Peck Lake to the dam will make for rough waves and create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters should use caution if venturing onto the open waters of the Dry Arm of Fort Peck Lake up through the dam. For your personal safety, avoid theses areas. Stay close to shore or in more protected areas such as the Missouri Arm.
